main event: A sighting of an unknown object in Yuma, Arizona on 29 May 1957.
interesting points: The observed object was estimated to be 5 times longer than it was wide,The object was light grey and moved at an estimated speed of over 600 knots,The sighting lasted between 6 to 10 seconds,The observer was using 6x10 binoculars while looking at the stars when the object appeared,There were no radar or electronic detections of the object.
